en_question:
1.33 A farm has 100 hectares (hm²) of land and 15,000 yuan of funds available for production development. The farm has 3,500 person-days of labor in autumn and winter, and 4,000 person-days in spring and summer. If the labor is not fully used, workers can go out to work; the wage income in spring and summer is 2.1 yuan/person-day, and in autumn and winter is 1.8 yuan/person-day.The farm grows three types of crops: soybeans, corn, and wheat, and raises dairy cows and chickens.When planting crops, no special investment is needed. When raising animals:Each dairy cow requires an investment of 400 yuan,Each chicken requires an investment of 3 yuan. Each dairy cow also requires 1.5 hm² of land for forage planting, and labor: 100 person-days in autumn and winter, 50 person-days in spring and summer, Annual net income is 400 yuan per cow.Chickens do not occupy land, but require labor:0.6 person-days per chicken in autumn and winter,0.3 person-days per chicken in spring and summer,Annual net income is 2 yuan per chicken.The current chicken house allows a maximum of 3,000 chickens to be raised, and the cowshed allows a maximum of 32 dairy cows.The labor required and income from the three crops are shown in Table 1-9. Table 1-9
ItemSoybeansCornWheat
Autumn and Winter labor (person-days)203510
Spring and Summer labor (person-days)507540
Annual net income (yuan/hm²)175300120
Try to determine the farm’s operational plan that will maximize annual net income.
cn_question:
1.33某农场有100hm²（公顷)土地及15000元资金可用于发展生产。农场劳动力情况为秋冬季3500人日，春夏季 $4000$ 人日，如劳动力本身用不了时可外出干活，春夏季收人为2.1元/人日，秋冬季收人为1.8元/人日。该农场种植三种作物：大豆、玉米、小麦,并饲养奶牛和鸡。种作物时不需要专门投资,而饲养动物时每头奶牛投资 400 元,每只鸡投资3元。养奶牛时每头需拨出 $1.~5~\mathrm{{hm^{2}}}$ 土地种饲草，并占用人工秋冬季为100人日，春夏季为50人日，年净收人400元/头奶牛。养鸡时不占土地，需人工为每只鸡秋冬季需0.6人日，春夏季为0.3人日，年净收人为2元/只鸡。农场现有鸡舍允许最多养3 000只鸡,牛栏允许最多养32头奶牛。三种作物每年需要的人工及收入情况如表1-9所示。 表1-9
项目大豆玉米麦子
秋冬季需人日数203510
春夏季需人日数507540
年净收入/（元/hm²）175300120
试决定该农场的经营方案，使年净收人为最大。
